channel.title: Visual Studio on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Is native Windows PowerShell support coming to Visual Studio?
item.description: Not completely yet. But, the Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 RC release seems to be a step in that direction. This update includes PowerShell syntax highlighting in the Visual Studio Editor.
